page.title: 04INDUSTRY IN FINNINGLEY
page.content: Finningley, although a{commuter {village}, has a small area of {industrial development.}But it is well {hidden}from the main part of the village and few passers-by know it exists. Yet the industries are well {known}in the area. Leons motor services operate the{bus services}into Doncaster whilst Biffa Waste Disposal's red lorries are often seen on the roads and lorry loads of {potatoes}head towards Higgins Potato store from surrounding farms. It seems odd that such a{rural environment should be home for these industrial concerns. However the most suprising "find" is R.E.Trem & Co. Ltd. whose {engineering business}lies hemned in between Leons bus garage and a bungalow - who would have thought such a business could exist in this location ?
